%%pyspark
blob_account_name = "samasterclouddev01"
blob_container_name = "airbnb"
from pyspark.sql import SparkSession

sc = SparkSession.builder.getOrCreate()
token_library = sc._jvm.com.microsoft.azure.synapse.tokenlibrary.TokenLibrary
blob_sas_token = token_library.getConnectionString("SAsamasterclouddev01")

spark.conf.set(
    'fs.azure.sas.%s.%s.blob.core.windows.net' % (blob_container_name, blob_account_name),
    blob_sas_token)
df = spark.read.load('wasbs://airbnb@samasterclouddev01.blob.core.windows.net/input/listings.csv', format='csv'
## If header exists uncomment line below
##, header=True
)
df.write.mode("overwrite").saveAsTable("default.YourTableName")
